description: Experience Date Z in all of its glory – this content pack contains additional storylines starring Alicia, Bao and Vivica, allowing you to explore every branch of the story unfolding at Massville High and expand your romance options, upping your chances of survival and finding happiness. Be wary – romances with three new girls could be an uphill battle as they all have their own personalities, quirks, traits and moods, so choosing a new path will present a new set of challenges. Do you think you are up for the task?
name: Date Z - Romance Completionist Pack
